txt.en: Although Dwalin and the other Longbeards have permitted you to remain in Thorin's Hall, you have still to earn their friendship.
Although Dwalin and the other Longbeards have permitted you to remain in Thorin's Hall, you have still to earn their friendship.
You must earn Friend standing with the Dwarves of Thorin's Hall
Despite the unfortunate manner of your introduction, Dwalin and the Dwarves of Thorin's Hall now consider you a welcome guest.
